attributes.action: Global warming is caused by the sun - it is not us!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carbon dioxide makes up only 0.054% of our atmosphere - how the hell is that causing global warming? We are inconsequential compared to the sun! All you so-called environmentalists - do your research! This is all political!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
